original_title: Proslava 1600-godišnjice Milanskog edikta u Nišu 1913. Godine
overview: "On the 1600th anniversary of the adoption of the Milan edict of Emperor Constantine (born in Nis) and the 35th anniversary of the liberation of Nis from the Turkish rule, the Bishop of Nis, Dositej, initiated the great celebration that took place in Nis from 28th to 30th of December 1913." Yugoslav Cinematheque
title: Celebration of the 1600th Anniversary of the Milan Edict in Niš 1913
